content.rendered:
Join Us

Proud to be a #wappizen

To be a #wappizen is to be committed to making a difference. To be passionate. To be driven. To want to join a team that is changing the way the world works.

A #wappizen believes that technology can make a difference and that they are capable of building products that drive real impact. They love solving problems, making things better, and working with a team that shares their values. A #wappizen is proud of their work.

What we offer

Flexible working conditions with a Remote-First mindset

Contractor Positions

Competitive salary package

Investment Opportunities with a Stock Options Plan

Private medical insurance for you and your family

Paid time off and flexible sick leave policies (with an extra day off on your birthday)

Aggressive referral bonus scheme

Fast-paced environment that promotes personal growth and development

Fitness and Wellness Incentives

Continuous Training and Learning Funds

Fast paced, fun work environment

The equipment you need to thrive

Team-building activities, internal tournaments, fun bonding events

A strong and supportive team that has your back
